column4: What's the command to turn off or 'remove' your sound module?
anyone know how to remove the sound module?
if your gpu sucks, then beryl will suck
why do you want to do that?
why not just mute the sound?
I think you can disable that in the GDM setup, and then mute everything else in alsamixer
alsamixer migth mute GDM as well
are you running ubuntu, the gnome version?
in System - >Administration -> Login Window go to the accessories tab and uncheck the sounds
what makes you think it doesnt?
follow the how-to. you shouldnt have tried xgl in the first place
AIGLX works! weee beryl on my laptop! :D
ok, give something else to do with my time now lol
